text: VH1 Storytellers is the second live album by American hip hop artist Kanye West. It was released on January 5, 2010 by Roc-A-Fella Records. The album was recorded live in February 2009. ==Track listing== # "See You in My Nightmares" – 3:13 # "RoboCop" – 6:17 # "Flashing Lights" – 6:41 # "Amazing" – 8:24 # "Touch the Sky" – 9:53 # "Say You Will" – 7:42 # "Good Life" – 6:30 # "Heartless/Pinocchio Story" – 11:01 # "Stronger" – 4:53 ==References== Category:2010 albums Category:Kanye West albums Category:Hip hop albums Category:Electronica albums Category:R&B; albums
title: VH1 Storytellers (Kanye West album)
